deployTo.message: Define the remote path where the project will be deployed. A directory releases is automatically created. A symlink current is linked to the current release

repositoryUrl.message: Git URL of the project repository.

ignores.message: An list of comma seperate paths that match ignored files(Eg .git,node_modules,static)

keepReleases.message: Number of releases to keep on the remote server.

RequireSSHKey.message: SSH key to login to remote server

branch.message: Tag, branch or commit to deploy.

verboseSSHLevel.message: SSH verbosity level to use when connecting to remote servers. 0 (none), 1 (-v), 2 (-vv), 3 (-vvv).

deleteOnRollback.message: Delete release when a rollback is done.

bashFilePath.message: Bash File which you want to execute on the remote server to build, start process(PM2)
